      • getFragmentTransaction

        public android.app.FragmentTransaction getFragmentTransaction(android.app.Activity context)
        Gets the android.support.v4.app.FragmentTransaction from the Context and removes any android.support.v4.app.Fragment with the tag `GenericPopup` from the transaction. Then nullifies the stack by calling android.support.v4.app.FragmentTransaction#addToBackStack(String) with a null value.
        Parameters:
        context - Activity The activity context where this transaction called from
        Returns:
        fragmentTransaction android.support.v4.app.FragmentTransaction
